content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I deleted the "rental_lodging_options.txt" file using the "delete_file" command and received confirmation that it was deleted. I then used the "google" command to search for the best kayaking routes in Norway and received a list of websites with information on the topic.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/", "question": "What are the best kayaking routes in Norway?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on the top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Ver√•s Larsen, along with a paddling code for safety. It also offers tips and a list of companies for various outdoor activities, but another text is an advertisement for skiing with no information on kayaking routes.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.visitnorway.com/)', ' (https://www.visitnorway.com/)', 'or search all of Norway (https://www.visitnorway.com/search/?q=)', 'Places to go (https://www.visitnorway.com/places-to-go/)', 'Fjord Norway (https://www.visitnorway.com/places-to-go/fjord-norway/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
